pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovadanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.5: “Yampi mayaṃ, ayye, gaccheyyāma ovādassa kāraṇā, ayyā chabbaggiyā idheva āgantvā amhe ovadantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ na gacchissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ na gacchantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ na gacchissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.14: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gaccheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.1.9: Ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gacchissāmīti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
